scripts.perftest: source .env && docker pull grafana/k6 && docker run --rm -p 5665:5665 -e K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true -e PERF_TEST_URL="${PERF_TEST_URL}" -v $(pwd)/test/performance:/test/ -i grafana/k6 run --insecure-skip-tls-verify /test/script.js --out csv=/test/test_results.csv
scripts.perftestwin: source .env && docker pull grafana/k6 && docker run --rm -p 5665:5665 -e K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true -e PERF_TEST_URL="${PERF_TEST_URL}" -v %cd%/test/performance:/test/ -i grafana/k6 run --insecure-skip-tls-verify /test/script.js --out csv=/test/test_results.csv
scripts.build: cd ../utils && npm install && cd ../CoreDeployable && npm run install-packages && npm run build-code
scripts.install-packages: npm run build-runtime && npm install core-runtime-1.0.0.tgz core-govuk-1.0.0.tgz core-gcds-1.0.0.tgz core-ouds-1.0.0.tgz core-wds-1.0.0.tgz core-nhsuk-1.0.0.tgz core-fcads-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.build-runtime: cd ../CoreRuntime && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreGovUK && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreGCDS && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreOUDS && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreWDS && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreNhsUK && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreFCADS && npm run build && npm pack && cd ../CoreDeployable && npm run copy-runtime
scripts.copy-runtime: node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreRuntime/core-runtime-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-runtime-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreGovUK/core-govuk-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-govuk-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreGCDS/core-gcds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-gcds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreOUDS/core-ouds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-ouds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreWDS/core-wds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-wds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreNhsUK/core-nhsuk-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-nhsuk-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ../CoreFCADS/core-fcads-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./core-fcads-1.0.0.tgz
scripts.build-code: tsc && node ../utils/recursiveCopy.js --originFolderPath ./src/ --targetFolderPath ./lib/ && node ../utils/recursiveCopy.js --originFolderPath ./services/ --targetFolderPath ./lib/services/ && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./package.json --targetFilePath ./lib/package.json && npm run copy-runtime-to-lib
scripts.copy-runtime-to-lib: node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-runtime-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-runtime-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-govuk-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-govuk-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-gcds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-gcds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-ouds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-ouds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-wds-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-wds-1.0.0.tgz && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-nhsuk-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-nhsuk-1.0.0.tgz  && node ../utils/fileCopy.js --originFilePath ./core-fcads-1.0.0.tgz --targetFilePath ./lib/core-fcads-1.0.0.tgz
